description:
### IsUnstablePair

This program checks if two input strings are unstable pairs. An unstable pair is set where filename1 < filename2, but when both are converted to upper case, filename1 > filename2, or vice versa. The output of the function is a boolean representing whether the input pair is unstable or not.

Input: Two strings
Output: Boolean

Example:

```js isUnstablePair("aa", "AAB") // true ```
